name: Liquid Light (itch)
description:
Fight, hide and survive!

Liquid Light is a Top down shooter created over 16 weeks for the Media Design School BCT course.

Fast paced stealth action shooter.

3 challenging stages

+ Hive mode for hardcore players

Free!

Thanks to JFK for the Stage 3 beat

https://soundcloud.com/jfkzzz

Expect updates in the future

Gameplay - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZkkcgQ-q6d4
